name: Pin the ‚ùñ Tail on the Donkey
description:
Using Figma's interactive components, here's a rendition of the classic party game, Pin the Tail on the Donkey.


Perfect for remote birthday parties, quizzes or passing time before your meeting.


Simply update the image assets and you will have your own version of the game working in no time. Be sure to republish your versions of this file to the community, I'd love to have a go at your game!


And if you played my donkey game seriously, let me know how many to got correct in the comments below ;)
